TopicTitle: Determining what mod is eating memory.

Articles.Content:
I have quite a few mods installed, and they have been playing together well. That is until I decided it was time to start launching SSTO spaceplanes. I can't even make it to orbit with one with out running out of memory. I watched it happen several times. Memory stays pretty level until I start generating lots of heat. At this point it begins to climb rapidly, causing a ctd from out of memory shortly after I ignite my LFOs. Some times I do end up making it to space, but am not there for long. Any way I can determine what mod is causing this besides elimination?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-27T02:23:54Z" title="05/27/2015 02:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 27, 2015</time> by icedown**
It's not a mod doing it -- there's a huge memory leak related to PPFX that heats up when your craft heats up. Turn-off PPFX, revisit the issue when 1.03 is released.
Thank you so much! Was not looking forward to going through my 30+ mods to figure out who was so damn hungry.
